en.Reminder plugin for Obsidian. This plugi: Reminder plugin for Obsidian. This plugin adds feature to manage TODOs with reminder.

en.Commit-and-sync with default settings me: Commit-and-sync with default settings means staging everything -> committing -> pulling -> pushing. Ideally this is a single action that you do regularly to keep your local and remote repository in sync.
en.Most of the time you want to push after: Most of the time you want to push after committing. Turning this off turns a commit-and-sync action into commit only. It will still be called commit-and-sync.
en.On commit-and-sync, pull commits as well: On commit-and-sync, pull commits as well. Turning this off turns a commit-and-sync action into commit only.

es.Commit-and-sync with default settings me: Commit-and-sync with default settings means staging everything -> committing -> pulling -> pushing. Ideally this is a single action that you do regularly to keep your local and remote repository in sync.
